content.question: On a global scale, the implementation of the types of policies that Rivett-Carnac advocated for in the passage is most significant in that it directly led to the

choices.label: dramatic increase of migrants from colonial societies to imperial metropoles
growth of nationalist movements in colonial societies against imperial rule
increased influence of laissez-faire economic philosophies among nationalist leaders in colonial societies
growth of labor union membership among colonial populations

content.answer: growth of nationalist movements in colonial societies against imperial rule

topic.text: 6.3: Indigenous Responses to State Expansion from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
